xt:extension.xt:author: Dartmouth College Library
xt:extension.xt:name: MODS (Metadata Object Description Schema)

xt:description.p: The Dartmouth College Library's local implementation of MODS, the Metadata Object Description Schema.

ul.li: Update "MODS-to-MARCXML" transformation (field enhancements and support for item records).
Update Dissertation and Films record templates.
Add schema support for performers note, image/jpeg internet media type, @objectPart on mods:language, @type on mods:shelfLocator.
Simplify and enhance CSS for display in Author mode.
